item.title: ChatGPT Is a Blurry JPEG of the Web
item.description: … It retains much of the information on the Web, in the same way that a retains much of the information of a higher-resolution image, but, if youâ€™re looking for an exact sequence of bits, you wonâ€™t find it; all you will ever get is an approximation.
